product_name: BIC Sport Carbon Stand Up Paddle - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With a perfect amount of flex during the stroke and a smooth feel in the water, the 23 oz. BIC Sport Carbon Stand Up Paddle offers extremely lightweight performance. Mid-size blade is ideal for all-around padding, racing, low-cadence paddling styles and those looking for a lot of power in the water. Carbon fiber shaft provides an extremely lightweight connection to the water. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes; blade shape pulls smoothly through the water. Closeout.
short_description: With a perfect amount of flex during the stroke and a smooth feel in the water, the 23 oz. BIC Sport Carbon Stand Up Paddle offers extremely lightweight performance.
